tinyFarmDatas.EventDetails: Harvest 10 purple sweet potatoes and gather special sunshine to share with your friends.
Raise 5 sheep on your farm and take adorable pictures of them.
Plant 3 new types of flowers and beautifully decorate your garden to show off to your friends.
Prepare 3 dishes using ingredients grown on your farm and share them with your friends.
Harvest 20 fruits for visitors to your farm and prepare for a festive celebration.
